description: This file serves as the entry point for a React-based frontend application, rendering the main App component into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering the React application.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A component that helps highlight potential problems in an application.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React application into the specified DOM node.
